email.title: Chobots Membership
email.content:
Hi from the Chobots team,
You have bought the membership for %2$s month(s) on Chobots for your child's account %1$s. It will expire on %3$s (Chobots time or GMT).
If you have any questions, please contact our Support team at Support@Chobots.net. They will willingly help you.
Link: %4$s
Have a great day, Chobots Team Support@Chobots.net
